faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.subtitle: Find answers to common questions about our pricing and services

billing.question: How does billing work?
billing.answer: We bill monthly with a one-time setup fee. You'll be billed on the same date each month. You can upgrade or downgrade your plan at any time.

channels.question: What are additional channels?
channels.answer: Additional channels are social media platforms beyond your first one. For example, if you start with Instagram, adding Facebook would be an additional channel.

cancel.question: Can I cancel anytime?
cancel.answer: Yes, you can cancel your subscription at any time. You'll continue to have access until the end of your billing period.

support.question: What kind of support do you offer?
support.answer: We offer 24/7 email support for all plans. Premium plans include priority support with faster response times.

cta.title: Ready to Transform Your Social Media?
cta.subtitle: Start your 14-day free trial today. No credit card required.
